item.title: Keep Slides Concise and Impactful 🎨 • Limit each slide to one key message. • Use visuals to support your points. • Include a concise personal story. • Avoid text-heavy slides—be engaging. • Use: “I led a team to increase sales by 20%.” How can you simplify your slides to highlight your strengths? #presentation #jobsearch #CareerForward #CareerFocused #CareerForge
item.description: Keep Slides Concise and Impactful 🎨 • Limit each slide to one key message. • Use visuals to support your points. • Include a concise personal story. • Avoid text-heavy slides—be engaging. • Use: “I led a team to increase sales by 20%.” How can you simplify your slides to highlight your strengths? #presentation #jobsearch #CareerForward #CareerFocused #CareerForge
